title: Constitution
content:
Points - the amount of damage you can take.

Constitution saving throws are quite common. For example, all Concentration throws for spellcasters target Constitution.

Your Constitution modifier contributes to your hit points. Typically, you add your Constitution modifier to each Hit Dice you roll for your hit points

If your Constitution modifier changes, your hit point maximum changes as well, as though you had the new modifier from 1st level. For example, if you raise your Constitution score
